title: Exquisite Diamond and Pink Quartz Antique Haaram
materials: Faceted Pink Quartz Beads. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi Kundan setting.
features: Features intricate floral motifs embedded with diamonds, complemented by blue enamel accents, set in a Kundan style. The cascading pink quartz beads offer a touch of modern elegance to the traditional design. The design is similar to "Addigai" necklace but more elaborate and longer.
colors: Pink (Quartz). A classic and sophisticated color palette.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and grand celebrations (Pedda Pandugalu). Also suitable for upscale evening events and receptions.
description: This haaram showcases the exemplary craftsmanship of Hyderabad's jewelry artisans. The combination of brilliant-cut diamonds, pink quartz and vibrant colors creates a statement piece that beautifully blends tradition with modern sensibility. A symbol of prosperity and beauty, it makes a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
